item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

getting this error after removing the .(). so the code looks like this now:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && client.playerRights > 1) { client.spellTeleport((3087), (3494), 0); client.sM("Welcome home");

and the error looks like:

.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: cannot find symbol client.spellTeleport((3087), (3494), 0); ^ symbol: method spellTeleport(int,int,int) location: variable client of type Client 1 error still one error… what u think i do fail?

item.title: How do i add a command to deltascape? rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

As you can see with “public static void customCommand(Client client, String playerCommand) {”, “client” is how you access variables/methods in your Client class, so you got that right.

So, anymore errors because you removed the “.().”?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a command to deltascape? rep++ :)

item.title: How do i add a command to deltascape? rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

this is my whole commands.java

[code]package org.model.commands;

import org.Server;
import org.entity.NPCHandler;
import org.model.Client;
import org.model.PlayerHandler;

public class Commands {

public static void customCommand(Client client, String playerCommand) {

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("mypos") && client.playerRights > 0) {
		client.sM("AbsX: " + client.absX + " AbsY: " + client.absY + "");
	}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("pnpc") && client.playerRights >= 2) {
		int npc = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(5));
		if (npc < 2745) {
			client.npcId = npc;
			client.npcId2 = npc;
			client.isNpc = true;
			client.updateRequired = true;
			client.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("unpc") && client.playerRights >= 2) {
		client.isNpc = false;
		client.updateRequired = true;
		client.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("combat") && client.playerRights > 2) {
		int combat = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(7));
		client.extraCb += combat;
		client.updateRequired = true;
		client.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("emote") && client.playerRights >= 2) {
		try {
			int emote = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(6));
			if (emote < 3999 && emote > 0) {
				client.pEmote = emote;
				client.updateRequired = true;
				client.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				client.sM("Bad emote ID");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Bad emote ID");
		}
	}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("message") && playerCommand.length() > 8
			&& client.playerRights > 2) {
		String text = playerCommand.substring(8);
		client.yell("[SERVER]:  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
				+ text.substring(1));
	}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("changepassword")
			&& playerCommand.length() > 15) {
		client.playerPass = playerCommand.substring(15);
		client.sM("Your new pass is \"" + playerCommand.substring(15)
				+ "\"");
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("npc") && client.playerRights >= 3) {
		try {
			int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
			if (newNPC >= 0) {
				Server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, client.absX,
						client.absY, client.heightLevel);
				client.sM("You spawn an npc");
			} else {
				client.sM("No such NPC.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {

		client.sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
				+ " players!");
                            }
	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && client.playerRights > 1) {
                            client.spellTeleport((3087), (3494), 0);
                            client.sM("Welcome home");
                            }
	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bootall")
			&& client.playerRights > 2) {
		PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("kick") && client.playerRights > 1) {
		Client noob = null;
		for (int i = 0; i < PlayerHandler.players.length; i++) {
			if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) {
				if (playerCommand.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(
						PlayerHandler.players[i].playerName)) {
					noob = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[i];
					noob.disconnected = true;
					noob.logoutButton = true;
				}
			}
		}
	}

	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("npcreset")
			&& client.playerRights > 1) {
		for (int i = 0; i < NPCHandler.maxNPCs; i++) {
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
				if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2627
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2630
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2631
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2741
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2743
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2746
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2738
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3777
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3778
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3779
						|| Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3780) {
					Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = false;
				} else
					Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true;
				Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0;
			}
		}

		client.yell("System Message - Server npc reset by "
				+ client.playerName);
	}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("unmuted1") && client.playerRights >= 0) {
		if (client.checkLog("mutes", client.playerName)) {
			client.sM("You have been muted for bad behavior, you can't use this command!");
		} else {
			client.muted = false;
			client.sM("Thank-you for proving that you aren't a bot, you are unmuted.");
		}
	}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("gfx") && client.playerRights >= 3) {
		int gfx = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
		if (gfx < 655) {
			client.stillgfx(gfx, client.absY, client.absX);
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("interface") && client.playerRights > 2) {
		int id = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(10));
		client.println_debug("Interface: " + id);
		client.showInterface(id);
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele") && client.playerRights >= 2) {
		String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
		if (args.length == 3) {
			int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			client.toX = newPosX;
			client.toY = newPosY;
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("banuser") && client.playerRights > 1) {
		try {
			String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(8);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				client.writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
				p.disconnected = true;
				client.sM("You have banned " + p.playerName + "!");
			} else {
				client.sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("ipban") && client.playerRights > 1) {
		try {
			String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(6);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
				p.disconnected = true;
				client.sM("You have ipbanned " + p.playerName + "!");
			} else {
				client.sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("mute") && client.playerRights > 1) {
		try {
			String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(5);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				p.muted = true;
				client.writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
				client.sM("You have muted " + p.playerName + "!");
			} else {
				client.sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("ipmute") && client.playerRights > 1) {
		try {
			String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(7);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				client.writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "mutes2");
				p.muted = true;
				p.sM("You have been ip muted by " + client.playerName);
				client.sM("You have ip muted " + p.playerName + "");
			} else {
				client.sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to ip mute..");
		}
	}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome") && client.playerRights >= 2) {
		try {
			String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(10);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				{
					p.toX = client.absX;
					p.toY = client.absY;
					p.heightLevel = client.heightLevel;
					p.updateRequired = true;
					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					p.sM("You have been teleported to " + client.playerName);
				}
			} else {
				client.sM("The name doesnt exist.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto") && (client.playerRights >= 2)) {
		try {
			String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(8);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
				{
					client.toX = p.absX;
					client.toY = p.absY;
					client.heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
					client.updateRequired = true;
					// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins =
					// "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName;
					client.sM("Teleto: You teleport to " + p.playerName);
				}
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			client.sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to..");
		}

	}
	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && client.playerRights > 1
			&& !client.isInPitGame()) {
		client.openUpBank();
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("empty")) {
		long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
		if (now - client.lastAction < 60000) {
			client.sM("You must wait 60 seconds after an action to ::empty!");
			client.lastAction = now;
		} else {
			client.removeAllItems();
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
		String message = playerCommand.substring(4);
		if ((client.playerRights == 1)) {
			client.yell("[MOD] " + client.playerName + ": " + message + "");
		}
		if ((client.playerRights == 2)) {
			client.yell("[ADMIN] " + client.playerName + ": " + message
					+ "");
		}
		if ((client.playerRights == 3)) {
			client.yell("[OWNER] " + client.playerName + ": " + message
					+ "");
		}
		if ((client.playerRights == 0)) {
			client.yell("" + client.playerName + " - " + message + "");
		}
	}
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && client.playerRights > 2) {
		String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
		if (args.length == 3) {
			int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
				client.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
			} else {
				client.sM("No such item.");
			}
		} else {
			client.sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100");
		}
	}
}

}
[/code] understand now what i did wrong? o.O

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a command to deltascape? rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:36, topic:424359”]now i added this command: if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && client.playerRights > 1) { client.().spellTeleport((3087), (3494), 0); client.sM("Welcome home"); }

and got this error: .\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: <identifier> expected client.().spellTeleport((3087), (3494), 0); ^ 1 error of course i have fixed something, because now its 1 error and not 2… so, what looks wrong this time?[/quote]
“client.b[/b].spellTeleport” is just stupid. Learn the basics about Java before continuing: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/

Better yet, post your whole Command class and I’m sure you haven’t listened to me or zyle.

Edit: providing your instances are correct, it’ll be client.spellTeleport

item.title: How do i add a command to deltascape? rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Very confused as to what source you have now…

You should try to understand the errors that are appearing, as these are simple things to fix. Pasting the error and expecting someone to fix it without your source will be hard because we cannot browse your files for methods and how variables are used.

I noticed through a lot of those errors you had “SendMessage”. That’s no good because you should always begin method names with a lowercase letter and any sequential words should be capitalized… “sendMessage” would be the correct format, but for Delta (I’ve never used it before), isn’t sendMessage simply “sM”?

Is your server packaged? Look through your Command class and check other commands that have not been altered by you, and see how sendMessage is called. If it has a c.sM(“Message here.”); format, then use that.

If you look through your Client class you can check the methods and how they are declared.

For instance you might have:

public void sM(String str) {//sends a message
//packet shit here
}

This would mean you would use the method like so: “sM(“Welcome to RuneScape.”);”.

“Welcome to RuneScape.”; is a String in Java, and it is inside a method sM();. You can use this concept to look up all your teleport methods and see how they should be implemented.

If at the start of your Commands file you see “Client c” anywhere, then this means a new instance of the public class file “Client” has been created, and you can now access Client.java inside another file, like so:

public class Commands {
        public void playerCommand(Client c) {
                c.sM("Welcome to RuneScape");
        }
}

c. accesses the Client class, because sM(String); is a method in the Client class. Hopefully, now you can look around your files and understand what you are looking for instead of people telling you to add c.getPA().sendMessage(String); when that method does not even exist in your source.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a command to deltascape? rep++ :)

item.description:

now i got this error: [code].\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: cannot find symbol
client.getPA().spellTeleport((3087), (3094), 0);

                                  ^

symbol: method getPA()
location: variable client of type Client
.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:86: error: cannot find symbol
client.sendMessage(“Welcome home”);
^
symbol: method sendMessage(String)
location: variable client of type Client
2 errors[/code] its 2 errors now, not 3 so itts something who have been fixed… this is what i added now:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && client.playerRights > 1) { client.getPA().spellTeleport((3087), (3094), 0); client.sendMessage("Welcome home"); }

[quote=“neroxx, post:28, topic:424359”]i got this error: [code].\org\model\commands\Commands.java:84: error: cannot find symbol
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && c.playerRights > 1
) {
^
symbol: variable c
location: class Commands
.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: cannot find symbol
client.getPA().spellTeleport((3087), (3094), 0);

                                  ^

symbol: method getPA()
location: variable client of type Client
.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:86: error: cannot find symbol
client.sendMessage(“Welcome home”);
^
symbol: method sendMessage(String)
location: variable client of type Client
3 errors[/code]

by adding this:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && c.playerRights > 1) { client.getPA().spellTeleport((3087), (3094), 0); client.sendMessage("Welcome home"); }[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

i got this error: [code].\org\model\commands\Commands.java:84: error: cannot find symbol
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && c.playerRights > 1
) {
^
symbol: variable c
location: class Commands
.\org\model\commands\Commands.java:85: error: cannot find symbol
